alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:28PM CDT until May 07 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR COUNTY... At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near View, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Caps around 540 PM CDT. Merkel and Dyess Afb around 545 PM CDT. Tye around 550 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Camp Butman. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 263 and 273. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
